com.logimethods.nats.connector.spark

Class SparkToNatsConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logimethods.nats.connector.spark.AbstractSparkToNatsConnector
      • com.logimethods.nats.connector.spark.SparkToNatsConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SparkToNatsConnector
extends AbstractSparkToNatsConnector
implements Serializable
    A Spark to NATS connector.

    It provides a VoidFunction<String> method that can be called as follow: 

    rdd.foreach(SparkToNatsConnector.publishToNats( ... ));
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • publishToNats

        public static org.apache.spark.api.java.function.VoidFunction<String> publishToNats(Properties properties,
                                                                                    String... subjects)
        Will publish the Strings provided (by Spark) into NATS.
        Parameters:
        properties - Defines the properties of the connection to NATS.
        subjects - The list of NATS subjects to publish to.
        Returns:
        a VoidFunction<String>, backed by a SparkToNatsConnector, that can be called to publish messages to NATS.

      • publishToNats

        public static org.apache.spark.api.java.function.VoidFunction<String> publishToNats(Properties properties)
        Will publish the Strings provided (by Spark) into NATS. The list of the NATS subjects (separated by ',') needs to be provided by the nats.io.connector.spark.subjects property.
        Parameters:
        properties - Defines the properties of the connection to NATS.
        Returns:
        a VoidFunction<String>, backed by a SparkToNatsConnector, that can be called to publish messages to NATS.

      • publishToNats

        public static org.apache.spark.api.java.function.VoidFunction<String> publishToNats(String... subjects)
        Will publish the Strings provided (by Spark) into NATS. The settings of the NATS connection can be defined thanks to the System Properties.
        Parameters:
        subjects - The list of NATS subjects to publish to.
        Returns:
        a VoidFunction<String>, backed by a SparkToNatsConnector, that can be called to publish messages to NATS.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()

      • publishToNats

        public void publishToNats(Object obj)
                   throws Exception
        A method that will publish the provided String into NATS through the defined subjects.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object from which the toString() will be published to NATS
        Throws:
        Exception - is thrown when there is no Connection nor Subject defined.
